Topic: Draw a string telephone between two students.
Evidence Statements: The student can draw and label a string telephone device that allows communication over a distance.
The student can show how the device uses sound by illustrating sound waves traveling through the string.
The student can include and identify at least two students using the device at each end.
The student can demonstrate the importance of the device by illustrating a situation where communication over a distance is helpful.
The student can represent materials realistically by using only materials provided for constructing the drawing.
